text: www. popsugar. com / Sunday, 12 November 2017 11 : 05 : 29 Taylor Swift's sixth studio album, Reputation, just might be her most personal one yet. In several of the songs, the ` ` Look What You Made Me Do'' singer seems to be calling out those who have wronged her, including Kanye and Kim Kardashian - West. ` ` It was so nice being friends again / There I was, giving you a second chance / But then you stabbed my back while shaking my hand,'' she sings in ` ` This Is Why We Can't Have Nice Things.''
